mapper.insert: insert into payment(pmNo, odNo, portOneNo, pmPrice, pmMethod, pmCard, pgCorp, odDate, pmState) values(#{pmNo}, #{odNo}, #{portOneNo}, #{pmPrice}, #{pmMethod}, #{pmCard}, #{pgCorp}, now(), #{pmState})
insert into order_(odNo, mbNo, nmNo, odPoint, odCoupon, odPrice) values(#{odNo}, #{mbNo}, #{nmNo}, #{usePoint}, #{odCoupon}, #{odPrice})
insert into order_(odNo, nmNo, odPoint, odCoupon, odPrice) values(#{odNo}, #{nmNo}, #{usePoint}, #{odCoupon}, #{odPrice})
insert into orderproduct(odNo, tnNo, opIntro) values(#{odNo}, #{tnNo}, #{opIntro})
insert into paymentCancle(pcNo, odNo, pcPrice, pcContent, pcDate, pcState) values(#{pmNo}, #{odNo}, #{pcPrice}, #{pcContent}, now(), 'cancle')
insert into point_(mbNo, ptPoint, ptBalance, ptContent) values(#{mbNo}, #{ptPoint}, #{ptPoint}, #{ptContent})
insert into usepoint(mbNo, usePoint, useContent) values(#{mbNo}, #{usePoint}, #{useContent})

select max(nmNo) as nmNo from nonmember
insert into nonmember(nmName, nmPhone, nmPwd) values(#{nmName}, #{nmPhone}, #{nmPwd})
